mapper.insert: insert into db_library.tb_users (username, password, user_number, classname) values (#{user.getUsername()}, #{user.getPassword()}, #{user.getUserNumber}, #{user.getClassname});
mapper.update: update db_library.tb_users set username = #{user.getUsername()}, password = #{user.getPassword()}, user_number = #{user.getUserNumber}, classname = #{user.getClassname} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from db_library.tb_users where username like #{%username%}
select * from db_library.tb_users where classname like #{%classname%}
